componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This is not an active contract, so you cannot add additional installations or terminations. Please ensure the contract includes valid contract terms, a contract start date, and an end date. The contract end date must be a future date.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This contract either has no end date or contract term. The end date must be a future date. You cannot process amendments or renewals for this contract.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This contract has enabled the Do Not Auto Renew. You cannot process renewals for this contract.
